participant_1.background:
I collect recipes for my favorite foods, including Italian dishes and hot wings.
I am known for my talents and my love of my family.
I used to be very closed off about my sexuality.
i like to build things.
I have a brand new car to match my new mansion.

participant_2.background:
I do not have kids, but I love taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores.
My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet.
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
i m hoping to find someone to marry me.
my favorite season is duck hunting season.

content.text: My name is Emily, what's yours?
Nice to meet you Emily. I'm (name).
Nice to meet you too (name). So, what do you do for fun?
I love to cook, build things, and spend time with my family.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go to local coffee shops and bookstores with my friends.
That sounds really nice. I used to go to coffee shops a lot, but I've been a little busy lately.
I know what you mean. I've been really busy too. But I'm hoping to get back into it soon.
That's great! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of books, but I'm especially interested in books about nature and history.
That's cool. I used to love reading about history when I was younger.
It's never too late to start reading about history again!
I know, I know. I'll have to check out some books from the library soon.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll find something you like.
